content: cbs pattern crochet water bottle holder contents introduction - 3 key terms - 4 round 1 - 5 round 2 - 6 round 3 - 7 round 4 optional - 8 round 5 - 9 round 5 continued - 10 straps - 11-14 introduction this is an intermediate friendly pattern if you are somewhat familiar with most crochet but have never crocheted a circle when you crochet a circle there is a pattern called an increase this is when you put two stitches in the same loop instead of just the one stitch i highly recommend watching patterns on how to crochet a circle before following this pattern if you haven t already if you have any questions reach out to me enjoy the free pattern happy crocheting cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs cbs
